title: Winning Westeros w/Max Brooks and ML Cavanaugh
description:
Max Brooks is the author of World War Z, ML Cavanaugh is co-Founder of the Modern War Institute. With several other authors, they combined to write an excellent book due out in July. We had a fantastic discussion that involved Ned Stark, Mycah the Butcher's Boy, the responsibilities of leadership, climate change, refugees, dragons, and so much more. 

The book can be pre-ordered here: https://amzn.to/2PTey4h
Support History of Westeros: bit.ly/howpatreon
Flick Invite Link (PHONE ONLY): bit.ly/howflick
Discord Invite Link: bit.ly/howdiscord
Facebook group: bit.ly/howfb
YouTube: bit.ly/howyoutube
